author: Staff Reporter
text: The Chennai Corporation has informed the Madras High Court that efforts will be taken to demolish all the old and dilapidated buildings in Gorge Town area within three months. Counsel for the Corporation made the submission on a contempt application from activist ‘Traffic’ Ramaswamy which came up before the First Bench of Chief Justice S.K Kaul and Justice Pushpa Sathyanarayana on Thursday. Mr. Ramaswamy had filed a PIL to demolish the old buildings, which posed threat to the public .
title: Corporation seeks time
